verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: went] [ARG4: to the State Department] [ARGM-TMP: for the first time on Wednesday] [ARGM-PRP: for the ceremonial swearing - in of Mike Pompeo as the nation 's new chief diplomat] and took the opportunity to " insult " State Department employees .
